author: CBS News
title: Coronavirus updates: COVID-19 symptoms keep U.K. leader in intensive care
description: Boris Johnson is the first major world leader to be side-lined by the new virus, as evidence mounts that dramatic lockdowns are helping to flatten the curve.
content: Hours after President Donald Trump warned of "retaliation" if Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi refused to allow the export of anti-malarial drugs, India said it would supply hydroxychloroquine to "nations that have been badly affected," without naming the … [+1088 chars]
